characteristics.name: Relationship
characteristics.description: Defines whether the sprite is a character (player, ally, adversary, neutral) or a static item.

properties.name: Self
properties.description: The player-controlled character.

properties.name: Ally
properties.description: A character allied with the player.

properties.name: Adversary
properties.description: A character working against the player.

properties.name: Neutral
properties.description: A character with no set agenda.

properties.name: StaticItem
properties.description: A static object in the environment, like walls, doors, or items.

characteristics.name: CharacterClass
characteristics.description: The class of the character, defining its skills and role in gameplay.

properties.name: Warrior
properties.description: A melee fighter with high physical strength.

properties.name: Mage
properties.description: A spellcaster with powerful magic.

properties.name: Rogue
properties.description: A stealthy fighter with high agility.

properties.name: Bard
properties.description: A versatile character using music to enhance allies or hinder enemies.

characteristics.name: CharacterLevel
characteristics.description: Represents the character's experience level and overall strength.

characteristics.name: HealthPoints
characteristics.description: Defines the character's current and maximum health points.

characteristics.name: ManaPoints
characteristics.description: Defines the character's current and maximum mana for casting spells.

characteristics.name: Durability
characteristics.description: Represents the toughness or durability of a character or static item.

characteristics.name: Stamina
characteristics.description: Represents the character's physical endurance for actions like running or using abilities.

characteristics.name: Stealth
characteristics.description: Represents how well the character can avoid detection or move undetected.

characteristics.name: Attractiveness
characteristics.description: Represents the character's charm or charisma, influencing social interactions.

characteristics.name: Strength
characteristics.description: Represents the character's physical power for combat and carrying capacity.

characteristics.name: Intelligence
characteristics.description: Affects the character's ability to cast spells, learn magic, and solve puzzles.

characteristics.name: Dexterity
characteristics.description: Represents agility, affecting a character's ability to dodge or use ranged weapons.

characteristics.name: Constitution
characteristics.description: Affects a character's overall toughness and health regeneration.

characteristics.name: Charisma
characteristics.description: Affects social interactions and persuasion skills.

characteristics.name: Affinity
characteristics.description: Represents the character's or static item's affinity for different elemental or mystical forces.

properties.name: Cold
properties.description: Affinity with cold magic or environments.

properties.name: Heat
properties.description: Affinity with fire or heat-based magic.

properties.name: Life
properties.description: Affinity with healing or life-giving powers.

properties.name: Death
properties.description: Affinity with necromantic or death-related magic.

properties.name: Wind
properties.description: Affinity with air and wind-based magic or environments.

properties.name: Water
properties.description: Affinity with water magic or aquatic environments.

properties.name: Earth
properties.description: Affinity with earth magic or environments related to nature.

behaviours.name: Aggression
behaviours.description: Determines how likely the character is to attack or engage in combat.

properties.name: Passive
properties.description: Avoids combat and doesn't initiate attacks.

properties.name: Defensive
properties.description: Fights only in self-defense or to protect others.

properties.name: Aggressive
properties.description: Eager to engage in combat and initiates fights.

properties.name: Berserk
properties.description: Completely loses control in combat, attacking wildly.

behaviours.name: Restlessness
behaviours.description: Governs how much a character moves around versus staying in one location.

properties.name: Stationary
properties.description: Remains in one location without moving.

properties.name: Occasional Movement
properties.description: Moves infrequently, staying in the same general area.

properties.name: Wanderer
properties.description: Moves frequently but remains within known areas.

properties.name: Restless
properties.description: Constantly moving around, never staying still.

behaviours.name: Stability
behaviours.description: How predictable the character's behavior is.

properties.name: Predictable
properties.description: Behavior follows a consistent and expected pattern.

properties.name: Occasionally Unstable
properties.description: Mostly predictable but with occasional erratic behavior.

properties.name: Unpredictable
properties.description: Behavior is erratic and difficult to predict.

behaviours.name: Persistence
behaviours.description: The tendency to stay focused on their goal versus getting distracted or giving up easily.

properties.name: Easily Distracted
properties.description: Gives up or gets distracted easily.

properties.name: Focused
properties.description: Remains focused on a goal with occasional distractions.

properties.name: Highly Persistent
properties.description: Very determined to achieve goals, rarely distracted.

behaviours.name: Curiosity
behaviours.description: How likely the character is to explore new areas or investigate unknown objects.

properties.name: Uncurious
properties.description: Shows no interest in exploring or investigating.

properties.name: Occasionally Curious
properties.description: Investigates new things occasionally.

properties.name: Highly Curious
properties.description: Constantly seeking out new information and exploration.

behaviours.name: Caution
behaviours.description: How careful the character is when moving or interacting with dangerous environments.

properties.name: Reckless
properties.description: Acts without regard for danger or consequences.

properties.name: Balanced
properties.description: Exhibits a balance between caution and risk-taking.

properties.name: Extremely Cautious
properties.description: Takes extreme care to avoid danger at all costs.

behaviours.name: Loyalty
behaviours.description: The character’s tendency to remain loyal to allies or follow commands.

properties.name: Unreliable
properties.description: Rarely follows commands and betrays allies easily.

properties.name: Loyal
properties.description: Generally follows commands and remains loyal to allies.

properties.name: Devoted
properties.description: Extremely loyal and willing to sacrifice for others.

behaviours.name: Fearfulness
behaviours.description: Governs how easily the character is frightened or flees in the face of danger.

properties.name: Fearless
properties.description: Shows no fear and stands their ground in danger.

properties.name: Occasionally Afraid
properties.description: May retreat in certain dangerous situations.

properties.name: Cowardly
properties.description: Flees or hides at the first sign of danger.

behaviours.name: Bravery
behaviours.description: How willing the character is to take risks or face danger.

properties.name: Cowardly
properties.description: Avoids risks and danger as much as possible.

properties.name: Brave
properties.description: Willing to take some risks and face challenges.

properties.name: Heroic
properties.description: Takes on extreme risks and faces danger head-on.

behaviours.name: Hostility
behaviours.description: Determines how hostile the character is towards others.

properties.name: Friendly
properties.description: Has a positive, non-threatening attitude towards others.

properties.name: Neutral
properties.description: Takes a neutral stance, neither hostile nor friendly.

properties.name: Hostile
properties.description: Openly hostile and aggressive towards others.

behaviours.name: Selfishness
behaviours.description: Governs how self-serving the character’s decisions are.

properties.name: Selfless
properties.description: Always puts others' needs before their own.

properties.name: Balanced
properties.description: Considers both self-interest and the needs of others.

properties.name: Selfish
properties.description: Acts primarily in their own self-interest.

behaviours.name: Greed
behaviours.description: The character’s tendency to prioritize wealth or resources.

properties.name: Content
properties.description: Satisfied with what they have.

properties.name: Opportunistic
properties.description: Seizes opportunities to gain more, when available.

properties.name: Greedy
properties.description: Driven by a constant desire for more wealth or resources.

behaviours.name: Patience
behaviours.description: How patient the character is when waiting for outcomes or dealing with obstacles.

properties.name: Impatient
properties.description: Gets frustrated easily when waiting.

properties.name: Moderately Patient
properties.description: Can wait for outcomes but still feels tension.

properties.name: Very Patient
properties.description: Comfortable waiting for as long as needed.

behaviours.name: Adaptability
behaviours.description: How well the character can adjust to changing situations or environments.

properties.name: Rigid
properties.description: Struggles to adjust to new circumstances.

properties.name: Flexible
properties.description: Adjusts to changes but may take time.

properties.name: Highly Adaptable
properties.description: Easily adjusts to new situations and environments.

behaviours.name: Alertness
behaviours.description: How aware the character is of their surroundings.

properties.name: Oblivious
properties.description: Lacks awareness of the environment or events around them.

properties.name: Aware
properties.description: Generally aware of surroundings but not hyper-vigilant.

properties.name: Hyper-aware
properties.description: Constantly aware of even the smallest details in the environment.

behaviours.name: Tactfulness
behaviours.description: How diplomatically the character approaches situations.

properties.name: Blunt
properties.description: Direct and lacking in subtlety or tact.

properties.name: Diplomatic
properties.description: Careful to avoid offending others while making points.

properties.name: Manipulative
properties.description: Uses subtlety to influence or control situations.

behaviours.name: Obstinance
behaviours.description: How stubborn the character is in their behavior.

properties.name: Flexible
properties.description: Open to changing behavior or opinions.

properties.name: Stubborn
properties.description: Resistant to changing behavior or opinions.

properties.name: Inflexible
properties.description: Completely unwilling to change behavior or opinions.

behaviours.name: Independence
behaviours.description: How likely the character is to act independently of a group.

properties.name: Dependent
properties.description: Relies heavily on others for decisions and actions.

properties.name: Balanced
properties.description: Acts independently but considers group needs.

properties.name: Highly Independent
properties.description: Acts without needing approval or input from others.

behaviours.name: Aggressiveness
behaviours.description: A tendency to resolve conflicts through force or violence.

properties.name: Peaceful
properties.description: Avoids violence and seeks peaceful solutions.

properties.name: Assertive
properties.description: Stands up for themselves without resorting to violence.

properties.name: Violent
properties.description: Resolves conflicts through force or aggression.

behaviours.name: Vengeance
behaviours.description: How likely the character is to seek revenge.

properties.name: Forgiving
properties.description: Does not seek revenge, even when wronged.

properties.name: Neutral
properties.description: May seek revenge depending on the situation.

properties.name: Vengeful
properties.description: Actively seeks revenge for perceived wrongs.

behaviours.name: Sociability
behaviours.description: Determines how social or withdrawn the character is.

properties.name: Introverted
properties.description: Prefers solitude and avoids social interactions.

properties.name: Balanced
properties.description: Comfortable with both social interaction and solitude.

properties.name: Extroverted
properties.description: Prefers being around people and seeks social interactions.

events.name: Attack
events.description: Performs an attack on an enemy

events.name: Defend
events.description: Raises a defense against an attack

events.name: PickUpItem
events.description: Picks up an item from the environment

events.name: OpenDoor
events.description: Opens a door in the environment

events.name: TriggerTrap
events.description: Triggers a trap in the environment

events.name: HealCharacter
events.description: Heals a character to restore health
